name: DeepDive (FinGames)
description:
DeepDive is a game made by FinGames for LudumDare 48.

In this game you play as a diver. Your job is to collect treasure and sell them on the ship for coins. Dive deep to discover the lost riches of the world. What valuables lie in the bottom of the sea? Only one way to find out...

This game was made by FinGames and we would love to get some feedback.

The game is designed for resolution 1920x1080.

Website: http://fingames0.webnode.fi/
